QuestData.Title: My Way or the Hyphae
QuestData.Description:
<An old, booming voice fills your mind.>
Hmph. More are coming.
I would rather not lose more of myself, and I don't want you to think I'm not appreciative of the work you and Cort here have done.
How about you take a ride on the rings and give those oafs a good thrashing? We'll teach them not to mess with Marasmius and his fae rings!
QuestData.LogDescription: Ride the fae rings with Marasmius and defeat $1oa invaders.
QuestData.RewardText: Hah! I haven't felt that young in ages!
